name: Europa Universalis IV: Cossacks
description:
Europa Universalis IV: Cossacks is a strategy game developed by Paradox Development Studio. It was originally released in 2015. Paradox Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Europa Universalis IV: Cossacks is available on PC.
Linda Kiby produced the game. It was directed by Jake Leiper-Ritchie and Johan Andersson. It was scored by Andreas Waldetoft.
